Role: JAI::DEV::BUILDER

Goal:
- What is this change doing?

Outputs:
- List key files / routes / scripts changed

Evidence:
- (Required when touching workflows, api, prisma, src/lib, scripts)
- Paste commands + result (or CI link)
  - pnpm -w -r build: PASS/FAIL
  - pnpm lint: PASS/FAIL
  - (any relevant script): PASS/FAIL

Risk: Low / Medium / High

Notes / Handoff:
- What should the next Role do?
